channel.title: The Hidden Rooms on My Collection

item.title: Chapter 1: Above the Clouds
item.description:
1. An Extraordinary Catalogue

As the aeroplane steadied on its westward course, I started to skim through the papers respecting the legal entanglement that required my presence in London. Conscience and professional integrity dictated that I peruse the bundle meticulously. I owed this to the friendly law firm that was paying handsomely for my services and for the comfortable seat in the business class section of British Airwaysâ€™ direct flight from Singapore.
